Make it high priority.

results.prompt_sent: Mark workunit db5aff1c783c4a738f536f5f1ad575bf as completed. Add completion notes explaining that the password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added.
model_responses:
I'm sorry, but I need to call the correct tool. Let me check: The user said "Mark workunit db5aff1c783c4a738f536f5f1ad575bf as completed. Add completion notes explaining that the password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added." We need to update a workunit's status to completed with completion notes.

We have function "update_workunit" which is used for updating workunits. The parameters required: id, update_mask (with paths), and then fields that can be updated. For marking as completed, we need to set status=completed and add completion_notes field. But note: the description says "completion_notes" is required when status=completed. So we must include both status and completion_notes in our update.

The tool "update_workunit" requires:
- id (string)
- update_mask with paths array
- then fields to update: name, description, problem_statement, success_criteria, priority, status, tags, completion_notes, archive_reason, due_date, owner_id, project_id

We need to set status=completed and add completion notes. The completion note text is "the password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added." But we must check if there's any formatting requirement? It says max 2000 chars for completion_notes.

So I'll call update_workunit with id = "db5aff1c783c4a738f536f5f1ad575bf", update_mask paths: ["status", "completion_notes"]. And then set status to "completed" and completion_notes to the text. But note that the tool requires update_mask as an object with property "paths". So I'll call:

{
  "id": "db5aff1c783c4a738f536f5f1ad575bf",
  "update_mask": {"paths": ["status", "completion_notes"]},
  "status": "completed",
  "completion_notes": "The password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added."
}

I'll check if any additional required fields? The tool requires id and update_mask. So that's enough.

I must call exactly one tool block with

tool_calls.name: update_workunit

arguments.completion_notes: The password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added.
